src:
Storspilte med bestefar Nils Arne Eggen på tribunen: – Det betyr ekstra mye
02 Nov 2019, 20:47 by Even Berthelsen
At Nils Arne Eggen så på barnebarnet Lars i rekordkampen i Trondheim Spektrum ble en gjensidig glede.
Tidligere Rosenborg-trener Nils Arne Eggen har, riktignok uten å være klar over det selv, hatt sesongkort hos Kolstad i tre år.
text:
Grandpa with grandfather Nils Arne Eggen in the stands: - It means a lot more
02 Nov 2019, 20:47 by Even Berthelsen
The fact that Nils Arne Eggen watched his grandson Lars in the record match in Trondheim Spectrum became a mutual pleasure.
Former Rosenborg coach Nils Arne Eggen has, although not aware of it himself, had a season pass at Kolstad for three years.
